summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3933 for the improvement of Vernon Place, from Ballard Avenue to Shilshole Avenue; by constructing concrete sidewalks fnd otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47909, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
